name: Casting Fireball in a small room
description: A classic tactical error involving tight spaces and 8d6 fire damage to your own party.

name: Trying to seduce the door
description: The Bard's last resort when the Rogue fails to pick the lock.

name: Dumping Intelligence
description: Playing a character who thinks a 'Mind Flayer' is just a really good hairstylist.

name: Rolling a Natural 1
description: The cosmic force that makes a legendary hero trip over their own cape.

name: Licking the dungeon walls
description: A highly unorthodox (and toxic) method for detecting secret passages or illusions.

name: Using Vicious Mockery on an orphan
description: Winning the argument, but losing your soul in the process.

name: Checking for traps with your face
description: The fastest way to find a pressure plate, though usually only usable once.

name: Stealing gold from the Paladin
description: A great way to test how 'lawful good' your friend actually is.

name: Demanding a long rest in a boss room
description: Sleeping soundly while the Big Bad Evil Guy watches in confusion.

name: Wild Shaping into a goldfish
description: A majestic transformation, assuming you are currently in a bowl.

name: Eating the quest item
description: It looked like a grape, but it was actually the eye of a dead god.

name: Using a 5th-level Smite on a squirrel
description: There is no such thing as 'overkill' in the eyes of the Gods.

name: Splitting the party
description: The number one cause of unexpected character sheet incineration.

name: Throwing pocket sand
description: The Rogue's version of a high-level blinding spell.

name: Begging the DM for a reroll
description: A desperate plea involving snacks, tears, or actual bribery.
